scripts.create:ibmcloud: npx webpack --config webpack.config.js && ibmcloud fn action create facility/getNearestFacilitiesFromList --kind nodejs:12 dist/bundle.js
scripts.deploy:ibmcloud: ibmcloud fn action update facility/getNearestFacilitiesFromList --kind nodejs:12 dist/bundle.js
scripts.deploy: npx webpack --config webpack.config.js && npm run deploy:ibmcloud
